Token.Abstract: Delegate used to request optional license parameters for license aquisition
Requests optional license parameters for license aquisition

Parameter.Name: urlSuffix
Parameter.Abstract: A URL suffix to be appended to the base license URL.

Parameter.Name: customParameters
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of key-value pairs to be added to the license request as URL parameters

Parameter.Name: customHeaders
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of key-value pairs to be added to the DRM request headers

Parameter.Name: renewalDate
Parameter.Abstract: A NSDate timestamp indicating when the license should be renewed

Parameter.Name: asset
Parameter.Abstract: The asset requiring an offline playback license
